name: AD-LTI
full_name: Anomaly Detection with Local Trend Inconsistency
paper: Developing an Unsupervised Real-time Anomaly Detection Scheme for Time Series with Multi-seasonality. TKDE
description: AD-LTI is a prediction-driven, unsupervised on-line anomaly detection method that combines time series decomposition and inference, and further introduces a real-time metric, Local Trend Inconsistency (LTI), for anomaly scoring.
